extended_validation.notes: VA-HIT & Helsinki Heart Study show cardiovascular benefits (22% reduction in coronary events). Not specifically HF but cardioprotective via HDL/triglycerides.
RCT showed significant improvement: FEV1 (P≤.001), symptoms (P≤.010), bronchodilator use (P≤.010). Prevents airway inflammation in murine models. Promising!
Inhaled formoterol prevents hypoglycemia (45-50% reduction in glucose infusion rate). Beta-agonists modulate glucose metabolism. 2023 Nature Comms trial.
No specific breast cancer research found. Ponatinib is primarily a BCR-ABL inhibitor for CML. FALSE POSITIVE.
No specific research found. However, amiloride (different diuretic) shows PD neuroprotection via ASIC inhibition. May be class effect detection.
Omega-3 supplementation reduced TNF-α/IL-17A in 72% of subjects. Higher omega-3 index = better asthma control. SPMs (resolvins) resolve inflammation.
FDA approved as adjunctive therapy. Phase IV RCT: 62.9% achieved DAS28-ESR<3.2. ACR50 in 62.5%, ACR70 in 30.1%. Used for refractory RA.
2024 PubMed: neuroprotection in MPTP rat models. Reduces neuroinflammation, protects dopaminergic neurons. LIGHT-MCI trial ongoing for cognitive decline. No direct PD trial yet.
